mapper.select: SELECT M.*,SUM(temp.play_one_day) AS play_count FROM (SELECT movie_id, play_one_day, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY movie_id ORDER BY play_date) AS rn FROM movie_playback WHERE play_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY movie_id, play_date) AS temp,movie M WHERE temp.movie_id = M.movie_id and temp.rn <= #{day} GROUP BY movie_id;

SELECT M.* FROM movie M,staff F WHERE M.movie_id = F.movie_id and (M.movie_title like concat('%',#{query},'%') or M.movie_region like concat('%',#{query},'%') or M.movie_type like concat('%',#{query},'%') or F.staff_name like concat('%',#{query},'%')) ORDER BY M.movie_title, F.staff_name, M.movie_region, M.movie_type;
SELECT m.*, IFNULL(SUM(mp.play_one_day), 0) AS totalPlays FROM movie m LEFT JOIN movie_playback mp ON m.movie_id = mp.movie_id GROUP BY m.movie_id ORDER BY totalPlays DESC
